entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Estevan Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Point 1:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 6.8°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia in the morning. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
